definition: to recycle/to reclaim/to retrieve/to recover/to recall (a defective product)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The experimental data showed that the results were better than those determined by partial least squares.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，經小波變換後處理結果回收率明顯提高。

sentences.english: Can we stop using the unrecyclable style of lunch boxes?
sentences.chinese: 我們能否停止使用不可回收的快餐盒？

sentences.english: Gold recovery from arsenic-containing gold ore has been a major subject of flotation research.
sentences.chinese: 從含砷金礦石中回收金一直是浮選研究的重要課題。

sentences.english: Purification and drying treatment of the reclaimed SF6 GAS.
sentences.chinese: 能對回收的SF6氣體淨化處理。

sentences.english: Design for Disassembly and Recycling (DFD&R) is the important content of Green Design.
sentences.chinese: 面向拆卸與回收的設計是綠色設計的重要內容。

sentences.english: My guess is that the garbage collector spends a considerable amount of time with collecting memory.
sentences.chinese: 我猜測垃圾回收器話費了相當多的時間去回收內存。

sentences.english: My guess is that the garbage collector spends a considerable amount of time with collecting memory.
sentences.chinese: 我猜測垃圾回收器話費了相當多的時間去回收內存。

sentences.english: So, how do we know recycling really is worth it?
sentences.chinese: 可是，怎樣才能知道垃圾回收確實值得我們如此？

sentences.english: If we recover the waste materials through grading recovery, we can create these renewable resources.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們開展分級回收，就能夠創造這些再生資源。

sentences.english: But some problems about the white bole efficient utilization have not been solved thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 但對鹼回收的白泥有效利用問題沒能徹底的解決。

sentences.english: Reclaim system of defective vehicles is one of important systems regarding vehicle management.
sentences.chinese: 缺陷車輛回收制度是車輛管理的重要制度之一。

sentences.english: A graywater catchment system could collect reusable water for irrigation and toilet flushing.
sentences.chinese: 廢水回收系統可以用來灌溉，也可以用來沖廁所。

sentences.english: Every migration plan should include a back out strategy.
sentences.chinese: 每個移植規劃應該包含一個回收策略。

sentences.english: Giacomo reclaims his daughter, and the King professes his love.
sentences.chinese: 賈科莫回收他的女兒，國王自稱他的愛。

sentences.english: The city council is axing recycling facilities in order to save money.
sentences.chinese: 市政會爲了省錢正在削減廢物回收利用設施。

definition: to destroy (by melting or burning)/to obliterate
to input/to throw in/to unload/to put into circulation
to regain/to retake/to take back/to withdraw/to revoke
to clear up/to tidy up/to dispose of
trash/refuse/garbage/(coll.) of poor quality/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4]
